value.stringValue:
IF(CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"03"), "Perform Tax Check", IF(CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"06"), "Perform Tax Check", IF(CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"08"), "Perform Tax Check", IF(CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"11"), "Perform Tax Check",
"Pending" ))))

formulas.name: formula_21_myRule_19_A1_1820380863
formulas.expression:
IF(CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject},"03"), "Perform Tax Check", IF(CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject},"06"), "Perform Tax Check", IF(CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject},"08"), "Perform Tax Check", IF(CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject},"11"), "Perform Tax Check",
"Pending" ))))

value.stringValue: AND( [Task].Current_Opp_Stage__c = "Review Client", ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Review Client") )

AND( [Task].Current_Opp_Stage__c = "Confirm Plan Approval", ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Confirm Plan Approval"), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Task].BK_Plan__c ,"Cancelled")) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.Current_Opp_Stage__c} = "Confirm Plan Approval", ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status},"Completed"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject},"Confirm Plan Approval"), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.BK_Plan__c} ,"Cancelled")) )

value.stringValue: AND( ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Pull & Store Bank Statements") )
AND( [Task].Current_Opp_Stage__c = "Clean Ups", ISCHANGED([Task].Status), ISPICKVAL([Task].Status,"Completed"), CONTAINS([Task].Subject,"Clean up and to-do list") )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_9
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.Current_Opp_Stage__c} = "Clean Ups", ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Status}), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status},"Completed"), CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Subject},"Clean up and to-do list") )

recordUpdates.name: myRule_3_A1
